amendment.description: To amend section 1113(c) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow local educational agencies to address the needs of children in schools served by schoolwide programs by providing school-based mental health programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2195 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
